content.detailedDescription: I watched the object in the southwestern sky on one occasion and last night it was in the western sky.  it is oblong in shape and twinkles like a star would but with bursts of blue and red.  very big bursts and at one point it looked like it opened up with all these lights inside. i was looking thru bonoculars.  it never moved it just stayed in one spot. i know it wasnt a plane or helicopter. i was just on my front porch enjoying a cigarette and this object attracted my attention.  i called my husband to look as he is a twilight zone watcher to see what he thought.  he was not very interested.  but he just blew my off oh its this or that. everntually it got late and i couldnt see it anymore because it went be hind acloud.
content.summary: Bright starlike object blue, red and white lites

content.detailedDescription:
while waiting for the reno balloon races to commence, i spent my time watching for satellites. after spotting a couple of normal ones, i saw a very unusual one. this one���s flight characteristic seemed to be like a butterfly in a strong breeze except very, very high up (high up enough to reflect sunlight at about 4:15am).  it appeared to be climbing in altitude quickly also. it was headed in a southerly direction and headed into orion. as it climbed, it seemed to slow and the just lazily move towards the westerly foot (star name = rigel) of orion. i pointed this out to a passing stranger who showed no particular interest. as it reached rigel, it slowed to a stop and reversed course. it was as faint as a smaller satellite at this point, and proceeded slowly in a northern direction past meissa (orion���s head), past mars and by triangulum. at approximately the star perseus, the object made an abrupt 90 degree turn to the east and started to slowly accelerate at first. a couple of women with their 2 children came to sit next to me and i pointed this out to them, as they focused in quickly, and the object accelerated  to the point that it went from almost straight above us, to beyond the horizon in about 2 or 3 seconds while the apparent size grew from a small, dim star to a moderate size star.  
 i have watched the stars since i was a child, and have studied astronomy for decades. the flight characteristics of this object matched no known aircraft that i have ever heard of as far as fluttering, ability to make an instantaneous 90 degree turn at velocity, or speed. to go from straight above to beyond the horizon at that altitude constitutes speeds that nasa could not duplicate in their wildest dreams.
 the weather was clear. a crescent moon and venus were in the east.
content.summary: This was too high to qualify for a true description

content.detailedDescription: I was looking due north when i saw a burst of orange light.  this was followed by many, possibly 15 strobes, flashing intermittently while disappearing and reappearing. nearly ten bright flares were seen over an hour and fifteen minute span.  one lit at about 5 degrees nne for about 5 seconds, then a second one lit at about 15 degrees that split into a pair of lights.  these lasted about the same duration.  as described in other reports these lights can be seen in the sky before igniting, and look like orangish or sometimes red/blue stars.  typically they will be slightly moving laterally, but little enough that not noticeable to the naked eye.  after several bursts in the nnw to nne area, the lights would disperse to the east/west only to converge again in the same northerly area of the sky about 20-25 minutes later.  some video was captured of the single lights and of the double.
content.summary: Sky was teeming with intermittent strobes, which lit up in flare-like fireballs.  strobes would seem to appear and reappear; dispursed in dif. directions.

content.detailedDescription: It was the early 90s,92 or 93 im not sure.Im from ireland i moved to switzerland in 92 with my family.I was living in a place called wadenswill in zurich.My brother and i were walking back to our apartment complex,early in the day,very few clouds in the sky,sky was blue.I still remember till this day what i saw,i looked straigth above my head,directly above us was a silver triangle.We could see it clearly,hard to tell how big it was,this lasted only a few seconds.In those few seconds we seen it,it was like watchin a plane when it was movin,moving very slow,this was no plane for the record.Planes are not shaped like a triangle.As it moved slowly it shot off,were i dont know.A few years later i was reading a book on ufos,and it mentioned something very interesting.The black triangle,this triangle was seen around europe in the early 90s,just like what i saw,the colour different.This black triangle was seen in these countries france,belgium,holland,germany,england.If you look at a map you will notice that switzerland borders france and germany.Also belgium and holland are a few hundred miles north of switzerland probly more.Strange things happened were i lived in wadenswill,i can only remember one incedent,i was in the tiolet when the whole building started to shake,this happened many times my mother said.These were army planes flying over causing sonic booms,or maybe some triangle ship,i did a bit of research and it all starts to make sense.Since the day i saw it iv never stopped believing that theres something out there..................As mulder and scully would say the truth is out there.
content.summary: Silver triangle hovering above us in the clear blue sky

content.detailedDescription:
It was approx 2am in the morning. i had just woke up from a dream, and as i looked at the ceiling i felt relieved i had woke up because of the nature of the dream, i didnt want to stay indulging in it. anway i moved my head from the ceiling towards my computer that is located near a window which was open (very warm night). that is when i saw the object. it hovered there right beside my computer, it almost reminded me of a colorful looking childs remote control, sophisticated jellyfish/flying saucer. basically what one would look like in 50 years from now.  it seemed to hover directed beside my computer as if it were communicating with it at the same time watching me as i slept,.
i got a good look at it and that is all i got. i was scared to death. ive always been intrigued of the ufo phenomena and wished to see something in the night skies. this was different though. this was in my home hovering beside my computer and it scared me. so i turned away, wiped my eyes to make sure i wasnt dreaming still and took a quick glance back to see if it was still there. it was gone. im not sure as to what this was. whether from this world or not, but i know that it was high tech, and the scaryiest part, was, how it got through the window screen. almost like it would have been transparent,. 
all i know is that im not crazy, and im not on drugs/medication. i saw this thing. it was there. now i wish i would have not turned away, but it was my first reaction to something so different. anyway, i think there is something out there watching us, and i for one want to know what the hell it is!!!!!!
in one sense i am frightend by this incident, but on the other hand i am mystified and want to know more about it,.

i have included a sketch, sorry for poor quality, but its the best i could do for now. if anyway else has had a simular expierence please help me to contact them, or contact me thanks

ebenjamino@gmail.Com
content.summary: Small object inside of home?

content.detailedDescription: Golden like orbs suddenly appearing in the western sky and fading out in a sequence. first it started out as just one light then faded instantly out. then about 4 minutes later more over towards the south/western sky 3  golden ords appeared then faded out one right after the other then within 15 minutes more lights appeared above the jerome cheese co. there were seven golden orbs all of them in a row and were lighted up then starting with the one on the left faded out then the next then the next and so on until they were all gone. then 10 minutes later three lights appeared over the plastic bag company across the street from the jerome cheese co. then they faded out. it continues to go on now, my fiance' is out back watching this continue while he is on the phone with the t.V. station trying to find out what is going on????
content.summary: Sequence of lights fading in and out in a row  disappearing and reappearing several minutes later

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car driving to work. there was this bright light in the sky. i thought this was strange, because it was cloudy and there were no stars to be seen, but there was a bright light in the sky. i thought maybe the object was a plane or a hellicopter. the light was stationary, just a bright light in the sky. today was the fourth time i have seen this light at the same time in the same place in the sky, in a week. today was different, when i stopped for the red light i'm watching the light and it went out, like someone turned off a light switch. it just went away! at first i'm thinking , this can be explaned. it must be some kind of aircraft or i'm not really seeing what i think i'm seeing (a ufo). i was excited and scared! has anyone else reported seeing this light in my area or i'm i going crazy?
content.summary: Light in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Our apt. is on the second floor with the living room window facing due north. i am constantly looking out at aircraft and the sky as a matter of habit as i am a flying buff and student pilot. 
  there is nothing but open field between my residense and the dayton int'l. airport which makes aircraft viewing a daily delight.
   the sky was virtually cloudless as a cold front had moved through earlier this morning.The sun was still up and  giving off a bright reflection  which caught my attention.The craft had already passed over the apartment  coming from the south east when i first noticed it. as i looked at it i was checking for wings , tail, power plant and or vapor trail but was unable to detect any. i began trying to determine size and altitude. i would have to say it had to be twice as large as a 747 body and an estimated altitude of 15 to 20 thousand feet. its airspeed was compareable to that of a piper cub.
   after assuring myself i wasn't watching just another aircraft flying over i called in my 10 year old son to ask him "whats that look like to you?" he caught sight of what i was looking at and after a moment or two he just simply said "a ufo". we watched it for a couple more minutes as it progressed on off to the north west with light being reflected off of it all the while.Eventually it was at too great of a distance to see it any longer.The entire sighting lasted about 4-5 minutes. 
    whether it was one of ours or "theirs" it was without a doubt. this by the way is not my first sighting by any means.

                                jeff lyons
content.summary: Passed @ high alt. slowly s.E . to n. n.W. silent no vapor trail.

content.detailedDescription:
i was walking to work, along centerville road. one truck passed me and i was watching the truck as it was going down the road. then, i noticed in front of it(the truck), an object rise out from some trees about a quarter mile or so up the road. my first thought was a helicopter, but, there are a few things wrong with that. it made no sound as it rose and took off, it had a light pattern that wouldn't make sense for a helicopter, and most obvious, what the heck would a helicopter be doing in the middle of a town. plus, there are several airfields nearby, so it's highly doubtful a pilot would choose the middle of town to touchdown instead of a few miles away. when it rose up, it was a quick, very straight climb to about 150 feet. then it hovered stationary for about 5 to 10 seconds. as it was turning to climb higher, i noticed that it started to wobble in a strange way. that is when it started to become clear that this was not a helicopter. as it turned i saw the arrangement of the flashing lights, then i was certain that this was something else. also, the truck was just kind of sitting at a stop sign as this was going on. so i knew that he or she was taking notice of what was going on in the sky. unfortunately, after the initial rise and turn to take off, the object was obscured by some trees i was walking by. so i could not make out a definate shape of the object. i saw it again as i came out of the canopy of trees about twenty seconds later, but by this time it was already a small ball of light cruising in the night sky. it was going very fast.
     a very interesting thing happened while i was walking under the trees, i noticed a sound that i knew well. it was the sound of a jet. sure enough too, the jet was on the trail of the ufo. well, not very hot on the trail of it. when i saw the jet following it, that is when i realized how fast it was actually going. watching the jet behind it made you almost want to laugh at how slow the jet was compared to the ufo. then i realized that the jet was aware and in pursuit (kind of). that may have been the reason for the hasty departure of the craft. so i am willing to bet that the craft was detected as an unidentified, so they sent a jet to check it out. so, i am sure that there is record of this happening, since it was only about 6 hours ago. 
     i did say my sighting lasted at least 10 minutes. while the jet was trailing the craft it seemed to stop at a very high altitude and then it luminated almost as a star. as i'm watching this in the sky, i have now walked fairly close to the area which the craft first rose, and i noticed trucks and jeeps driving around the general vacinity where it rose from. there are not many vehicles at all driving around at this time in this area usually. seemed even that they were almost looking for something. 
     back in the sky, the last strange thing happened. it looked, i won't say 100%, but it looked like the jet actually got close to the object as it was stationary and glowing bright. then it seemed as it got close, it turned away very suddenly and went in the other direction. almost like it was leaving it alone, or maybe the state the ufo was in, was causing problems with his jet. well, by this time i had managed to finish my walk to work, but then as i was walking in the building i took one last look at the sky and then saw that there were alot more jets, and helicopters, and the like. it seemed that the sky was just crawling with activity. anyway, i wanted to get this information to you before too long so maybe you will be able to find something out. i thought the whole event seemed very exciting, but i kept feeling a little concerned, because i kept thinking that someone, a fellow person, could have been taken. hope this helps, and it wasn't swamp gas (no swamps in the area). i also made damn sure i saw and knew where venus was too. which it was risen, and a good 90 degrees away from the craft at all times. good luck.
content.summary: Object moved straight up as a helicopter would, hovered, displayed numerous flashing lights. object then kind of wobbled, then went up very fast and shot off very fast.

content.detailedDescription: Downloading the photographs from my digital camera i noticed the strange object over  the river. i didn't see it while taking the picture. location is near twickenham, west of london, direction north-east. the object on the left side over the trees is an airplane. heathrow lies some miles to the west, twenty minutes later i shot some photographs of landing airplanes, they were flying very low, direction east-west. the ufo reminds me of the one reported 10/09/07 on your website from montserrat in spain (with picture dfsc5825.Jpg)
content.summary: Taking pictures during a boat trip on the thames

content.detailedDescription:
Jay gave me his old night vision scope we were out side with a 3rd person (bob)after playing around with them, we were chating about them when jay said look at that, when i looked it was moving realy fast head a west with a very slight angle south.
it disapeared in 30 to 45 seconds.

the 90 degree point was the leading edge in movement.


1)
we were all just out side the back door of our house not far from monroe ave and 1st street.

bob and jay were chating about the night scopes i was looking up to the south east at stars and listening to them.

2) jay said look at that.
i had to turn around to see it and dim lights on it were in a triangle shape.

3) 
i think maybe it was the flying wing but it was to fast in my opinion to be that, and again no sound from it.

4)
it was heading a few degrees south of east and it moved fast.


5)
surprised nothing more.

6)
it disapeared behind trees.


lee
content.summary: Triangle in shape, soundless, extreamly fast,

content.detailedDescription: In the evening of the date mentioned at 9:40 pm i sat outside of my basement appartment to smoke a cigarette when all of a sudden i noticed a small white light similar to that of a low flying aircraft moving in the lower sky, normaly i would not pay attention to this because i'm quite familiar with what i see in the sky in this region whether it be stars ( not many here for that matter because of light pollution) or the many lighted aircraft from the local airport, but what caught my attention is that it wasn't moving in a normal way of any kind, it was moving very erratically, constantly changing direction while always staying in the general vacinity, kind of like the way an insect would move when it hovers around, and while this small white light would move around a small blue light would momentarily flash for a fraction of a second right next to it, nothing like any of the night flying aircraft i have observed all my life. after a short minute of observing this object all of a sudden appeared a second similar object, and then a third! all moving in the same fashion as the first object and all moving independently of each other. after 4 or 5 minutes of observation i grabbed my camera bag, got in my car and headed in the general vacinity of where these objects were. having stopped at an overpass i got out my car to see where these objects would be and after carefully combing the sky with my eyes there was nothing left to be seen except for a dozen stars, that did not move! from my perspective i am not easily fooled by any kind of explainable event that would fool most people with untrained eyes, i have perfect vision, i have been an aviation enthusiast all my life and have been to many airshows, i even work in the aerospace industry, i build highly precise scale models and i'm also a semi professional photographer, so what i'm saying is that i have a very developed sense of vision and observation and i could not explain what i saw no matter how hard i tried, i do sincerely think i may have observed something unusual.              steve h.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange lights observed in lower suburban sky

content.detailedDescription:
I have hesitated to report the following sighting for obvious reasons���but i know what i saw.  i am a sociologist by profession and my husband is a ph.D., currently teaching at the local university.  what we describe in the following report is very much the truth.


the sighting (and later learned sightings) have been happening for quite some times.  we live in a small louisiana town. this is our story:


friday, september 7th, 5:20 a.M. is when i saw the ���boxed��� shape light, appearing in the e ne sky. the size was about a half dollar held at arms length.  i had had a restless night, battling a headache off and on all thursday night.  finally, at 5 a.M., friday morning, i got up, took something for the headache and tried going back to sleep.  however, sleep wasn���t going to happen, so i got up, put on coffee and went to the back porch to wait on the brew.  


it was a very cloudy, hazy morning.  we live on 2 acres, in a very nice subdivision.  i was sitting in my porch chaise and observed something coming through the haze.  we have very large pecan trees (about 45-50 feet in height) and just above, slightly to the left of one of our large trees, was a very bright light.  it started out very dim, lighting the haze with a yellowish glow.  the clouds around the brightness were light and fluffy, with a chevron shaped appearance.  then, all of a sudden, a very bright ���boxed��� shape light emerged through the clouds.  there was no noise from the object; it just sat there.  the bright light became very dim and the hazy like clouds reappeared.  at this point, i ran back into the house and yelled at my husband to come see.  i wanted a witness.


he got up out of bed, came to the porch and looked out over the tree���in the mean time, i retrieved my digital camera which proved of no use because the object didn���t show up in the lens.  my husband observed the bright object, sleepily said it was the moon and went back to bed.(later to learn that he knew it wasn't the moon...Just something to say to calm me down. i was very  excited about the observation and was shouting at him on the porch "what the hell is that??"...It was 5:20 - 5:25  in the morning and the neighbors still sleeping was not the time to be loud.) 


now i don���t know much about where stars are located and where the moon is suppose to be at 5:20 a.M. in eastern louisiana, but i knew it was not the moon���the sun was about to come up in the eastern horizon.  there was no way it could be the moon.  it appeared again as a bright, "boxed" shaped light and i watched it for a few more seconds and it finally disappeared through the clouds.  total time of observation was about 5 minutes.


later in the morning when my husband returned from the university, we  packed our truck to go to our cabin in texas.  he was laughing at me for getting him up so early, but then later, as we drove to texas, being very serious, he told me something very disturbing.  


he is asthmatic and goes outside many times during some nights to get fresh air and get over his attack.  he told me that he had seen that same ���boxed��� shape bright light many times, located in the same area of the pecan tree, (give or take a few degrees) but had not said anything about it.  i asked him if it was always around 5:30 a.M. and he said no���sometimes he sees it before midnight, sometimes around 2 a.M���he has forgotten how many time he has actually observed the bright ���boxed��� shape light. always with no noise associated with it���always in the same easterly direction. 


i checked with the local airport to see what time flights come and go in our city.  it���s a small airport and no major flights arrive before 8:00 a.M. from any direction.  


i then began to think back from the summer (july through early august) when we had our grandchildren with us for approximately 6 weeks.  the youngest one, who is 7, kept asking me why a bright light would shine into her bedroom window. she had asked that question many times during her stay.  i believed, at the time, it was the night light from across the street.  one night, while putting her to bed, i turned out the lights, pointed to the night light on our neighbor���s garage and asked her if that was the light she kept seeing. she said no, grandma that is not the light.  it is much brighter than that.  

so with the observation of the ���boxed��� shape light and now knowing that it appears at all times during the night, i am not sure  what ���light��� she kept seeing in her room.  i am wondering if the boxed-shape light has anything to do with her fears.  i don���t know! i just don't know.
content.summary: Boxed-shape light observed in backyard upon several occasions in small louisiana city

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i have just returned from holiday and were looking through our photo's when we spotted something unusual.  

in the attached picture there appear to be 3 objects in the sky, one central and two off to the left and at a distance.  the picture was taken from montserrat in spain last week, we did not notice these objects when taking the picture.  

i have also attached another picture taken moments before where the objects do not appear.

our reason for contacting you is for clarification, you have obviously seen more pictures and read more information of similar things and we're wondering if you could identify the object/s for us?
content.summary: Ufo caught in holiday photo

content.detailedDescription:
My sister and i were in a rickshaw thingy, moving past the potala place in lhasa, tibet. they seemed like they belonged in this sacred place. i felt deep sorrow, compassion, love and a sense of healing from them. they were singing. a lullaby a mother sings to an injured child. a song one cannot hear, only feel with your heart.
the tibetans did not even take notice. as if it was a normal occurrence. there is the palace. there is a taxi. there is a monk. there is a man on a bike. there is a truck full of chinese soldiers, and there in their sky, are glowing spheres of healing light.  

i had to put china as the country i was in. this was not in china. this was in tibet. 


after looking at the pictures you can decide if they are what i believed them to be. or if they are planets or stars. i saw the stare there. these were not stars

when i was in tibet.

i stood and looked into the sky���

and saw the stars for the first time.

as they really are.

reds and blues and greens and purple.

and colors i do not have a name for.

when i was in tibet

i stood and looked into the sky

and saw the stars for the first time.

i saw them for what they really are.

jewels���set by the hand of god.

xolton
content.summary: They were just hovering. floating over the potala place. in lhasa, tibet

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving east(just east of winslow, az) on i40 and she spotted an extremely bright light in the sky.  it was in southern sky and was kinda white/yellow against only the blue sky.  i watched as i drove.  it stayed in the same spot the whole time.  i told her to try to take some pictures of it and she was not able to take them fast enough.  the light had some clouds move closer to it.  this is when we took our pictures.  the clouds moved in front of and behind it with it staying still the whole time.  the about 10 minutes after first spotting it a cloud moved in front of it and after the cloud went by it was gone and blue on the other side again.  i do not know what exactly we saw but i have never seen anything like it.  it was much brighter than a star.  it was an amazing experience for both of us.

one strange thing is that when i looked at the picture later there is an odd disc shaped object to the right of the light.  we did not see that at the time but we were focused on the light.  the disc shaped object is almost exactly parallel with the light too.  also, if possible, i would like to have someone else's opinion on this.
content.summary: Bright light in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking to work in the early morning. it was still night time and not a cloud in the sky. you could see a lot of stars, the sliver of the moon, and venus very well. i was heading north bound on superior, just before 17th in costa mesa ca, when a brightly colored object flew across my vision from right to left. it looked like a giant light colored donut flying through the sky. it took about 3 seconds for it to cross over. i looked at my cell phone; it was 5:58 am. i knew that if it was a meteor shower there would be more. seconds later, a bright light shot across the sky heading north. it was just a streak of light.
 the funny thing is that the first object was heading east or south east, and seemed to zig zag when it was farther away; the second was heading north.  
  the first object was very strange. i couldn't tell if it as glowing or just brightly colored, like a very light orange. at first it looked like a donut, and then it looked like an acorn, then like a donut again. it was very large and at a much lower altitude than the second one. the second seemed to be far up above me moving fast, like a comet; when the first seemed lower and in front of me, and moving much slower than the second.
 the whole thing happened so fast. 
 it was freaky, and kind of cool.
content.summary: Two ufo's in costa mesa ca at 6 am on a clear night

content.detailedDescription: It was on a summer evening when i was talking to my cousin while sitting on my enclosed front porch. i was relaxing in a rocking chair talking to her while looking out my many windows. i looked to my left towards the river (north) when i noticed a few stars, i saw this white light which looked like a star moving, then it stopped and went out, then all of a sudden it turned into the "brightest orange solid ball shape" all the while staying in that same spot. i screamed to my cousin on the phone what i was seeing. then it went out like you turn off a light switch and when it came back on there wewre three of the orange ball shapes.They would do the same go out and come back on. they really put on a show !! all three were in the form of a triangle.Sometimes, the two at the bottom would go up and combine with the one on the top. i have seen ufos before, so i was not really like "what is that"? when it finally decided to move on after staying in this same spot for at least 10 minutes, the two at the bottom went up into the top orange ball like and then went back into a whit light like a star and slowly headed to the southeast. i lived two and a half blocks from the river, and it looked to be right over it.I mentioned this to a few people and found out later i wasn't the only one to witness this sighting.I did leave the phone and go outside to watch this and i heard no noise. nothing we have can do what this ufo did that night that is for sure. one of the other ones i seen was in the early evening coming up through a neighbors field. it was early evening and i had went out to check on my young dog and was looking down the gravel road and saw this "big saucer shape ufo with a dome and windows all around it", it was moving very slowly,no sound. i thought at first "what kind of farm machinery is that", it was so low to the ground. then the closer it got i knew it wasn't anything from out planet !! i ran to the front door and told my then husband "come fast a ufo" !!!! we stood there and watched it still coming up the field (and this field was right across our little gravel road). it started to pick up speed as it neared us while lifting up higher and went past us maybe 15 ft off the ground. then we watched it till it got out of sight. i looked at my husband and said "now don't ever tell me there are no ufos". it was the year 1976, and i was 27 years old and i am now 59. i have seen other ufos but not at the closeness as these two were. i know there are so many who don't beleive in them, but if they would ever see one they would. i know what i seen was nothing form this earth. what i seen these ufos do, we could not. there is a place they are coming from , but where?
content.summary: Looked like a star at first, but noticed it moving, then stopped and turned into a big orange solid circle, then divided into 3.

content.detailedDescription: Ok me and my friend where waiting in the pontiac northern high school parking lot for her friend we were going to a club and i look up because i saw something out of the corner of my eye.So i am standing there looking at this object and i keep tellin everyone to look up at it but they don't believe me.So i am standing there for about ten minutes watching this thing and it's just there in the sky hovering there like nothing it had blue,green,red and white lights on it blinking in a what looked like a pattern but i couldn't tell anyways it's just there right and what seemed really strange about it was its shape it was weird if you took a piece of paper and drew two lines same lenght one on top then one on bottom the drew the ends in a point.So it was there for ten minutes then it fadded a way and then we wen't about are what we where doing
content.summary: The object had blue,green,red and white lights on the outside of it. the object was flat on top and had pointed sides i noticed it in the sky it didn't move for the event but then it just fadded out

content.detailedDescription: This event happened just in front of my home.  4 objects looked like slow moving, dim stars going across the sky. objects each appeared for only a couple of minutes and appeared in different parts of the sky. objects were not all visible at the same time.  objects also moved in different directions. objects moved in straight lines. objects were barely visible to the eye. no sound with objects.Event took place between 8 and 8:30 pm on a mostly clear night.
content.summary: 4 objects looked like slow moving, dim stars going across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Myself,and my brother-in-law were returning to omaha following a star gazing evening east of louisville, ne. we were north bound on highway 50 at the interstste 80 interchange,when we had to detour due to accident.We had to go east to 126&harrison,now we are headed westbound,was stopped at red lite at 144th st.We noticed a very slow moving brite/intense white lite moving in our direction,from west to east/slightly north east,also noticed was short wings with two green lites strobing in unison.My brother-in-law joel stuck his upper body out of the window to follow object as it passed over us,what made this event strange was the fact that there was absoutely no sound coming from this object!!If this was our police helicopter it would have made lots of sound!!The estimated altitude was between 250 and 300 feet, again moving very slowly!! this also could not be a small aircraft,as it would have stalled out the foward speed was so slow!
content.summary: Brite/intense white lite with two strobing unison green lites outboard short wings

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were standing outside at night.  it was dark and clear.  we were closing the garden gate.  a movement in the sky came into view, just over the tress and houses across the street. i saw a v-formation of moving objects.  my initial thought was it was a flock of geese.  i alerted my son to look up.  he immediately saw the formation as well.  we both observed approximately five illuminated orbs in the sky approximately sixty feet over head.  they were arranged in a v-formation.  they flew above the trees lining the street.  they flew in formation in a sweeping forward motion moving up, down and at an angle, but always moving forward and maintaining the "v" formation. there was no sound.  the objects were illuminated.  my initial thought was how odd it was for geese to be so brightly lit at night by the street lights below.  almost immediately after i thought this, i realized that the light was wrong and these objects were not being lit from below.  i also realized that geese don't usually fly in the dark nor in the undulating pattern that we observed.  also the silence was unusual.  the light was constant and consistent.  each object appeared to be one large, soft light in a white or light yellow hue.  the light did not give off rays or illuminate the street or houses below.  the formation moved quickly up the street and over the trees at the end of the street.  my view of the end of the street was obscured by trees, and thus the formation fell out of my view.   this happened quickly, with a duration of approximately five to ten seconds.  the formation moved from east to west.
content.summary: V formation 5 orb like lights moving and swooping very fast ,silent and absolutely sychronized
